name: lucky_spin
description: This table records events related to lucky spins in a gaming environment, tracking user participation and outcomes.

columns.name: master_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for each lucky spin event.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the lucky spin event was executed.

columns.name: account_id
columns.description: Identifier for the account of the user participating in the lucky spin.

columns.name: balance
columns.description: The user's account balance at the time of the lucky spin.

columns.name: lucky_spin
columns.description: The number of spins the user has in this event.

columns.name: lucky_spin_type
columns.description: Type or category of the lucky spin event.

columns.name: card_id
columns.description: Identifier for the card or reward associated with the spin.

columns.name: processing_time
columns.description: Timestamp indicating when the lucky spin event was processed.

columns.name: schema_campaign
columns.description: The campaign or promotional schema associated with the lucky spin event.
